data.name: This Time - Exclusive Render Pack 1
data.detailed_description:
Grab yourself the first exclusive render pack for 'This Time'. It contains an exclusive set of images created especially for your viewing pleasure. Once purchased and installed the render pack will appear in-game.

Before buying, why not consider purchasing the VIP DLC instead which includes ALL exclusive render packs plus access to new versions 2 weeks early?

What is included in this DLC?
This DLC includes 4 exclusive images. These images were built in to the early releases of 'This Time' but have now been removed and placed into this FREE DLC.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains very graphic sexual scenes including close up fully exposed male and female genitals.
There are also some optional scenes which include prostitution and some non-consensual sex and sexual assault.
Some optional scenes contain non-consensual voyeurism such as peeking in changing rooms without permission.

The game also contains themes of suicide, drug use and alcohol use.
